reviewText: This is one of the best seires ever!!! The Closer is smartly written and brilliantly acted. It is cleaver and makes you feel hopeful for the justice system. I cannot recommend these dvd more highly. You will love this show!

reviewText: Anyone reading this review probably knows how terrific this series was. I bought it because I loved the development of the characters over the years and wanted to be able to check back in anytime I wanted. Kyra Sedgwick is a delight. If you missed the series, think Columbo in heels, with a Southern accent. Great twists and humor in a fun "Who Done It".
Title: N/A

reviewText: Kyra Sedgwick (Brenda Johnson) is not only a hot LAPD interrogator, she is a hot Deputy Police Chief who uses her down home southern charm to "get her man." Her brilliant ability to analyze the crime pieces makes her co-workers shake their heads in quiet admiration of her abilities. Deputy Police Chief Johnson is tough, no-nonsense, impatient, and down right crafty in getting her suspected criminals to confess to their crimes. Sometimes she can be unorganized, and she constantly fights her urges to snack on junk food. She finds comfort in calling her mother where she usually sinks into a child-like defensive state from a smothering mother. The Closer is a winner in the television police drama series category. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson adds her toughness, sophistication, humor, and intuition, with support from her co-workers, to solve crimes committed by the community upper crust.

reviewText: What a great TV series to watch. I wasn't really into this show at all till I caught an episode on Sunday afternoon. I was hooked!! After watching that episode on TV I went and got the 1st season on dvd. Now I have seasons 1-6 on dvd. I love Kyra Sedgwick as Brenda Lee Johnson. I love her Georgia Southern style accent. This show is better than CSI. The Closer is clean,funny and a excellent script. I am sad that season 7 is the last season. I hope that Brenda Lee goes out with a bang!
Title: N/A
